ISO/IEC 27701:2019 Security techniques

Extension to ISO/IEC 27001 and ISO/IEC 27002 for privacy information management.

The intended application of ISO/IEC 27701 is to augment the existing ISMS with privacy-specific controls and, thus, create PIMS to enable effective privacy management within an organization.

Info

  • The standard is available for purchase here: https://www.iso.org/standard/71670.html

  • The standard is expected to be replaced by ISO/IEC FDIS 27701 within the coming months. ISO/IEC FDIS 27701 draft is available here: https://www.iso.org/standard/85819.html
